title: S1 ADC, Gold IV MMR. LF s3+ team

embed.description: Leagues Legend / Silver 1 100LP / 162W 142L Win Ratio 53% / Kai'Sa - 56W 26L Win Ratio 68%, Tristana - 19W 13L Win Ratio 59%, Jinx - 16W 11L Win Ratio 59%, Swain - 16W 9L Win Ratio 64%, Jhin - 8W 7L Win Ratio 53%

body:
My flex is currently Bronze due to playing with mates and messing around all the time, but I've started taking solo a bit more seriously lately and have been rapidly climbing. 

I mainly play Team-fight orientated adc's much better, and hyper carries are my best. Currently running a 71% w/r with Kai in soloq and above 60% for most of my others too.  Kai>Jinx>Trist and Jhin are my best right now. But I can play most adc's fairly competently.
